name: The Missing Vape (Horror)
description:
Find the lost vape before charlie finds you! Collect the pieces and run for your life! 

How to Play

AWSD / Arrows - Moving

Mouse - Look

C - Zoom

Left Click - Grab items

Right Click - Drop items

But how do I use the tools? Just drop them! It will work. Note

The web version is kind of buggy I recommend downloading it for a better experience!
